column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The bosscat burger chef's way
column2: which our waitress stated was the best burger ever
column3: was pretty alright. Mine came out cold
column5: hard to get excited about that. My husband said his was average ("it's a burger
column6: so it's hard to mess that up"). Our other friend had ordered it too
column7: and he ended up eating half of it as served then just eating the burger patty by itself. The waitress came by and made a comment on how he had eaten the burger
column8: and I'm like wtf lady that's weird of you. Sorry
column9: did we need the chef's permission on the right way to eat it too?
